title: Stephen A. Smith Interview and More
itunes:title: Stephen A. Smith Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Stephen A. Smith who took the chance to sit in the hot seat with The Breakfast Club where he spoke about why he avoided us for so long, Antonio Brown and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to two Florida  men who pulled a gun at a Mcdonalds because their food was delivered cold and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
